name: Cave Master Wiskers
description:
"This is an idle game.
I just made this over the span of 3 days for fun. It's inspired by a mining game I saw on Kongregate, so I made this one just for Newgrounds. :P It's an idle game, you can click to help him out, or wait for him to gather resources. If people like it, maybe I'll make a advanced version with more features or something." - author's description
